ModMetaData.name: Crafted Mutants(continued+expanded)
ModMetaData.author: Mythos
ModMetaData.description:
Integrates extra features into RimWorld: - Installation of new body parts (third eye, more arms, supporting organ parts, etc.) - Harvesting and reintegrating of all available body parts and replacing with surrogates - Harvesting of mechanoid body parts for simple prosthetics
...and some things more...
Needs "Extended Human Body Simulation" above it in your mod list to work!
Credits and Thanks to... - PhileasFogg for the original mod! - Ykara, for his/her both fantastic mods, which I used as a basis, from which my small project started that (at first not intended) grew into this mod: "EPOE (Expanded Prosthetics and Organ Engineering)" and "Harvest Everything!" - Marnador, for the RimWor(l)d font. - Tynan, for this great game!
